attributes.background: All schools and  Restaurants should install unisex toilets for the trans  community.  It will help them feel more comfortable when they go to the bathroom

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like to see unisex toilets in restaurants but it is not the responsibility of the Government, but each individual restaurant to decide if they wanted to install unisex toilets. Regarding public spaces, it would be up to local authorities and not the Government to decide what toilets they would like to install in their public areas such as schools.

You may like to sign the below petition we have open on this topic:#

Fund gender neutral public toilets in public spaces
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586501
